verbs.description: hpd [V: looking] [ARG1: for suspect accused of trying to kidnap girl] authorities are looking for a man who tried to kidnap a girl in southwest houston monday morning according to the houston police department the 13-year - old told hpd officers she was walking near the walter neighborhood library around 8 a m when the man began following her and then chased her for two blocks she said the man threatened to kill her hpd said she was able to get away from him and was not hurt in the ordeal officers used k-9 to search for the man around fondren and bellaire the suspect is described as a 5'8 hispanic male with an athletic build he was wearing a blue shirt and black pants at the time fondren houston bellaire walter neighborhood library hpd houston police department
